item.title: Configure Influxdb with Grafana
item.description: I recently started using proxmox and was planning on monitoring metrics using InfluxDB and Grafana, which I have already deployed on my Kubernetes cluster.

item.title: Measure Raspberry Pi temperature using Telegraf, Influxdb, Grafana on k3s
item.description: In my previous post, I went through the k3s cluster home setup.
